revised_title: Investigating the Day-to-Day Variability of the Daily Magnetic Variation
tldr: This study examines the day-to-day variability of the daily magnetic variation at six magnetic observatories across different latitudes. The authors analyze the data to determine whether the variability is a local or a world-wide phenomenon and discuss the possible physical causes of the daily magnetic variation. They also explore the system of overhead electric currents that could produce the quiet-day solar diurnal magnetic variation.
